response.original_title: Mark Le Fevre: Det Fejler Ik' En Skid
response.overview: You may already know Mark le Fevre from his two successful one-man shows, Bøvl and Heldig, or as the assistant in the popular entertainment program Stormester, where, according to a viewer named Hanne, he is the best thing about the program.  Now he's going on tour with his third one-man show entitled: Det Fejler Ik' En Skid  "This show is the love child of my heart and something I'm incredibly excited to do.  The show is based on the small and big bumps in everyday life. Since then, I've become a father after a lot of hassle, been offered a very nice title, suffered a knee injury and lost a lawsuit. My girlfriend, who has a law degree, thinks I should leave it alone. But mark my words: I will get my revenge.
response.title: Mark Le Fevre: Det Fejler Ik' En Skid
